FAQ

Frequent Asked Questions

  • What is Datostada and what are its aims?

    Datostada: Where Science and Industry meet Data, in Mexico is an international meeting for academia, private companies and government, in order to prosecute and disrupt the scientific and technological potential in the southeast of the country and the neighboring regions, since such an event has been unprecedented.

    We want to accomplish this goal by democratizing knowledge on Data Science and Artificial Intelligence and their role in social good and natural science.
